Package com.bookmatch

Class ProductDao

java.lang.Object
com.bookmatch.ProductDao
public class ProductDao extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing product-related operations using Hibernate.

  • Method Details

    • saveOrUpdateBook

      public void saveOrUpdateBook(Books book) throws Exception
      Saves or updates a book in the database.
      Parameters:
      book - The book object to save or update.
      Throws:
      Exception - If multiple books with the same title and author are found.

    • saveOrUpdateComparePrice

      public void saveOrUpdateComparePrice(ComparePrices comparePrice) throws Exception
      Saves or updates a compare price entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      comparePrice - The compare price object to save or update.
      Throws:
      Exception - If multiple compare prices with the same URL, retailer, and image URLs are found.

    • saveOrUpdatePrice

      public void saveOrUpdatePrice(Price price) throws Exception
      Saves or updates a price entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      price - The price object to save or update.
      Throws:
      Exception - If multiple prices with the same URL and image URLs are found.

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the Hibernate session factory using the configuration file 'hibernate.cfg.xml'.
